participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and determined, Emily is focused on her studies and enjoys helping others.
participant_1.background: i work at a bar at night to pay for college. i don't like chicken. i've blonde hair and blue eyes. i'm in college to become a nurse.

participant_2.name: Raj
participant_2.personality: Free-spirited and enthusiastic, Raj loves to explore new things and enjoys life to the fullest.
participant_2.background: i am a swim coach at my local pool. my mother is very traditional while i prefer to be more free spirited. my family and i are from india. my favorite music genre is death metal. i am studying to be a computer programmer.

content.text: I like swimming, but I do n't have a swimsuit. ðŸ˜ƒ
I can train you to swim even without swimsuit at my local pool!
I love swimming! Do you work?
I work as a swim coach and study programming.
That sounds like a lot of fun! Whats your favorite thing to make?
I love chicken and rice. What do you do for fun?
I like to listen death metal a lot.
I go to the movies with my friends.
I do not have a favorite movie. What about you?
Why do you go to the cinema then?
I like going to the movies.
